ovdesc.p: This table is used to store different fee types in the payments hub.
Fee types can be segregated in two broad categories.

i. Conditional Fee Types – These are the Fee types which can only be applied for a transaction if there is a particular condition which is met. Example: Non-STP Fee. This Fee can only be applied if the transaction has been processed Non-STP. If the transaction is STP then the charge cannot be levied even if it is defined in the Client Charges table.
ii. Unconditional Fee Types – These are the Fee types which needs to be applied in all the cases if it’s defined for the Client.
